definition: letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: Now here’s Charlie, he’s come to the crossroads.
sentences.chinese: 那么现在查理，他也来到了十字路口。

sentences.english: Go down the street till the crossroads and turn left there.
sentences.chinese: 沿着这条路走到十字路口，向左拐。

sentences.english: The seven colors hill always have crossing.
sentences.chinese: 七色的歧路总有十字路口。

sentences.english: The performance wage system of the investment banking headquarters has come to a crossroad.
sentences.chinese: 投资银行总部的绩效工资制已走到了一个十字路口。

sentences.english: We are not yet at such a crossroads.
sentences.chinese: 我们现在站在商业变革之路上前所未有的十字路口处。

sentences.english: Go down the road. Then turn right at the first crossing.
sentences.chinese: 这条路直走，然后在第一个十字路口右转。

sentences.english: You are now at the crossroads, and it is your decision as to which way you go.
sentences.chinese: 你们现在处在十字路口，要往哪里走都是你们的决定。

sentences.english: This is Shibuya crossing in Tokyo, rumored to be the busiest pedestrian intersection in the world.
sentences.chinese: 这是京都涉谷区，传说是世界上最忙碌的十字路口。

sentences.english: The Education Centre is signposted at every crossing in the college.
sentences.chinese: 该大学的每个十字路口处都设有通往教育中心的路标。

sentences.english: I' ll stop for you at the crossroads.
sentences.chinese: 我们沿着这条路走，在十字路口左转。

sentences.english: An enemy battery zeroed in on the crossroad.
sentences.chinese: 敌人炮兵集中炮火于那个十字路口。

sentences.english: How often have you been almost killed by a rude driver while standing at a crosswalk?
sentences.chinese: 有多少次你站在十字路口差点被缺德的开车人轧死？

sentences.english: The cars slowed down as they approached the intersection.
sentences.chinese: 当汽车向十字路口靠近时减速。

sentences.english: Go ahead along the road and turn right at the first crossing.
sentences.chinese: 沿着知春路一直走，在第一个十字路口右转。

sentences.english: Go along the street and turn left an the crossing.
sentences.chinese: 延着这条街向前走，十字路口处向左转。

sentences.english: I was caught In the middle of the Intersection when the light changed.
sentences.chinese: 当灯号转换时我被困在十字路口。

definition: to go round a curve/to turn a corner/fig. a new direction
pedestrian/traveler on foot/passer-by/official responsible for arranging audiences with the emperor
